thread.title: Drunk Rob Gronkowski Nearly Drops Several Lombardi Trophies, Gets Crowd To Boo Roger Goodell At Patriots Championship Rally
thread.title_full: Drunk Rob Gronkowski Nearly Drops Several Lombardi Trophies, Gets Crowd To Boo Roger Goodell At Patriots Championship Rally

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Drunk Rob Gronkowski Nearly Drops Several Lombardi Trophies, Gets Crowd To Boo Roger Goodell At Patriots Championship Rally
text:
After chugging several beers at today’s championship parade it’s safe to say that Rob Gronkowski was completely wasted at tonight’s Patriots championship rally.
Watch as Gronk tries to juggle several Lombardi trophies which almost ends in catastrophe as he nearly loses control of them all. 
HAHAHAHA! GRONK ALMOST DROPS LOMBARDI TROPHYS!! @RobGronkowski fumbles #LombardiTrophy & almost drops em @ #RhodeIsland rally #wbz #Patriots pic.twitter.com/dFv9N8Tex2 
— Scott Sullivan (@SullyBunz) February 7, 2017 

Then he got to crowd to boo Roger Goodell. 
GRONK TALKS GOODELL! #Patriots TE @RobGronkowski tells fans in #Providence what he thinks about Roger Goodell! #Goodell #firegoodell #wbz pic.twitter.com/XNWLh3yOkz 
— Scott Sullivan (@SullyBunz) February 7, 2017 

Never change, Gronk.
